page.title: 07A Day in my life
page.content: On a Friday at about 08.15. I get up, dress and have breakfast. I get to school at about 08.50. When the bell goes at 09.00. we go into the hall and have an Assembly. After that we watch How we Used to Live .At 10.35. we have break,then we go back in and do some more work. At 12.00. we have our dinner. We have half an hour playtime and then we go into the Canteen. At 14.15. we go outside and play Netball. At 15.15. we go home. At 16.45. when my sister Susan comes home Aunty Peg comes from Huntley and she Mummy, Susan and me to Mitcheldean Library. When Susan and I have got our books we go up to the adult section. Aunty Peg and Mummy do some shopping. Then we go home, have some tea and then look at the books. We might go outside and play a game, or stay in and read. At about 22.00. we go to bed.
